name: CreateNewProduct
description:
Create a new product in the Freshservice catalog.

Use this tool to add a new product to the Freshservice Product Catalog. It is called when a new product entry is needed in the inventory or catalog database.

parameters.name: product_name
parameters.description: Name of the Product to be added to the catalog.

parameters.name: product_asset_type_id
parameters.description: Identifier for the asset type of the product, expected as an integer.

value_schema.description: Asset Type id of the Product

parameters.name: product_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the product in the catalog. It must be an integer.

parameters.name: manufacturer_name
parameters.description: The name of the product's manufacturer. It accepts free text input.

parameters.name: product_status_id
parameters.description: The status of the product: `1` - In Production, `2` - In Pipeline, `3` - Retired.

value_schema.description:
status can be
  `1` - In Production
  `2` - In Pipeline
  `3` - Retired

parameters.name: procurement_mode
parameters.description: Mode of procurement for the product. Use `1` for Buy, `2` for Lease, `3` for Both.

value_schema.description:
mode of procurement can be
  `1` - Buy
  `2` - Lease
  `3` - Both

parameters.name: depreciation_type_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the type of depreciation used for the product. This should be an integer value corresponding to the desired depreciation method.

parameters.name: depreciation_type_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used for the product.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: asset_type_id
parameters.description: Asset Type id of the Product

value_schema.description: Asset Type id of the Product

parameters.name: status_id
parameters.description:
status can be
  `1` - In Production
  `2` - In Pipeline
  `3` - Retired

value_schema.description:
status can be
  `1` - In Production
  `2` - In Pipeline
  `3` - Retired

parameters.name: mode_of_procurement_id
parameters.description:
mode of procurement can be
  `1` - Buy
  `2` - Lease
  `3` - Both

value_schema.description:
mode of procurement can be
  `1` - Buy
  `2` - Lease
  `3` - Both

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used
